thread.title: Is Beyoncé Playing the Halftime Show at Super Bowl 2017 - Lady Gaga Halftime Guest Rumor
thread.title_full: Is Beyoncé Playing the Halftime Show at Super Bowl 2017 - Lady Gaga Halftime Guest Rumor

author: Alyssa Bailey
title: Is Beyoncé Playing the Halftime Show at Super Bowl 2017 - Lady Gaga Halftime Guest Rumor
text:
So, Is Beyoncé Playing the Halftime Show With Lady Gaga? Most Popular By Alyssa Bailey Feb 5, 2017 The halftime show is still 30 minutes away, but Lady Gaga has given what seems to be a final answer on whether her "Telephone" duet partner Beyoncé will be making a surprise appearance on stage with her. A photo posted by xoxo, Joanne (@ladygaga) on Feb 5, 2017 at 2:32pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below She will not nor will anyone else, Gaga wrote on her Instagram. "There will not be any guest performers tonight, I'm doing these 13 minutes solo! I dedicate every second to the love, diversity, compassion, and wild spirit of our fan base." Beyoncé fan accounts confirmed Bey's absence too: Good morning! Just in case the devil is still lying, Beyoncé will NOT be joining @ladygaga during tonight's Super Bowl Halftime Show. ☎️❌ 
— THE BEYHIVÉ (@TheBeyHiveTeam) February 5, 2017 Most Popular Lady Gaga started the rumor earlier this week that Bey would join her when Gaga posted a 'gram of herself preparing in Houston, Bey's hometown, with a bee emoji in her caption. The Beyhive took note: A photo posted by xoxo, Joanne (@ladygaga) on Feb 1, 2017 at 12:17pm PST During the press conference for the game on Friday, Lady Gaga didn't quite put out the fire when she neither confirmed nor denied that Bey would be on stage with her . She said Bey is "very inspiring, and gives great advice," and told reporters she had sent flowers to the singer upon hearing the internet-breaking news of her second pregnancy . Last year, Bey crashed Coldplay's halftime performance last year and announced her Formation world tour . So while nothing is certain and final until this year's performance actually happens, it doesn't seem likely a Beyoncé duet is in the cards. More from ELLE:
